meanings.definition: The state or quality of not producing fruit.
meanings.sent1: The unfruitfulness of the apple tree was disappointing.
meanings.sent2: The unfruitfulness of the orchard was a concern for the farmers.
meanings.sent3: The unfruitfulness of the lemon tree made it the talk of the garden.
meanings.sent4: The unfruitfulness of the vineyard left the winemaker in despair.
meanings.sent5: The unfruitfulness of the peach tree was evident in its bare branches.

meanings.definition: The lack of productivity or success.
meanings.sent1: The unfruitfulness of the project was evident from the start.
meanings.sent2: The unfruitfulness of the meeting led to further discussions.
meanings.sent3: The unfruitfulness of the team's efforts was a source of amusement.
meanings.sent4: The unfruitfulness of the plan left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent5: The unfruitfulness of the campaign was a setback for the company.
